subject: Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament
lead_paragraph: Statistically, Georgetown’s Roy Hibbert did better than Ohio State’s Greg Oden on Saturday. But Oden’s Buckeyes are the ones who will be playing for a national championship.
snippet: Statistically, Georgetown’s Roy Hibbert did better than Ohio State’s Greg Oden on Saturday. But Oden’s Buckeyes are the ones who will be playing for a national championship.
